Create Volcano Plot from Differential Expression Analysis

Source: R/customized_vis.R
volcano_plots.Rd

This function performs differential expression analysis between two groups and creates volcano plots with optional gene labeling using EnhancedVolcano.

volcano_plots(
  object,
  idents,
  ident1,
  ident2,
  show_labels = FALSE,
  log2fc_cutoff = 1,
  p_cutoff = 0.01,
  file_name = NULL,
  title = NULL,
  width = 2000,
  height = 2000,
  resolution = 300,
  point_size = 1,
  label_size = 2,
  boxed_labels = TRUE,
  draw_connectors = TRUE,
  max_overlaps = 50
)

Arguments

object

A Seurat object containing expression data and metadata

idents

Character string specifying the metadata column containing group identities. This column will be set as the active identity.

ident1

Character string specifying the first identity group (numerator in the comparison, typically the "test" group).

ident2

Character string specifying the second identity group (denominator in the comparison, typically the "control" group).

show_labels

Can be one of three options:

  • FALSE (default): No gene labels are shown

  • TRUE: All gene labels are shown

  • Character vector: Only specified genes are labeled

log2fc_cutoff

Numeric value for log2 fold change threshold to highlight significant genes. Default is 1.

p_cutoff

Numeric value for adjusted p-value cutoff to highlight significant genes. Default is 0.01.

file_name

Optional character string for output file prefix. If provided, plots will be saved as PNG files. If NULL, plots are displayed but not saved. Default is NULL.

title

Optional character string for plot title. If NULL, no title is shown. Default is NULL.

width

Numeric value for plot width in pixels when saving. Default is 2000.

height

Numeric value for plot height in pixels when saving. Default is 2000.

resolution

Numeric value for plot resolution (DPI) when saving. Default is 300.

point_size

Numeric value for point size in the volcano plot. Default is 1.

label_size

Numeric value for gene label text size. Default is 2.

boxed_labels

Logical indicating whether to draw boxes around gene labels. Default is TRUE.

draw_connectors

Logical indicating whether to draw connectors from points to labels. Default is TRUE.

max_overlaps

Integer specifying maximum number of overlapping labels allowed. Default is 50.

Value

A list containing:

markers

Data frame with differential expression results from FindMarkers

n1

Number of cells in ident1

n2

Number of cells in ident2

deg_up

Number of upregulated genes (log2FC > cutoff, p.adj < cutoff)

deg_down

Number of downregulated genes (log2FC < -cutoff, p.adj < cutoff)

Details

The function performs the following steps:

  1. Counts cells in each group

  2. Performs differential expression using Seurat::FindMarkers

  3. Replaces p-values of 0 with machine epsilon to avoid plotting issues

  4. Creates volcano plot(s) with EnhancedVolcano

  5. Optionally saves plot(s) as PNG files

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# No labels (default)
result <- plot_volcano_de(
  object = seurat_obj,
  idents = "cell_type",
  ident1 = "CD8 T",
  ident2 = "CD4 T"
)

# Show all labels
result <- plot_volcano_de(
  object = seurat_obj,
  idents = "treatment",
  ident1 = "Treated",
  ident2 = "Control",
  show_labels = TRUE
)

# Show specific genes only
selected <- c("GNLY", "GZMB", "PRF1", "CCL4")
result <- plot_volcano_de(
  object = seurat_obj,
  idents = "Timepoint disease stage",
  ident1 = "FC",
  ident2 = "Acute HBV resolved",
  show_labels = selected,
  log2fc_cutoff = 1,
  p_cutoff = 0.01,
  file_name = "volcano/FC_vs_Acute",
  title = "CD8 T cells"
)
} # }
